Reviews.Title: “No way”
Reviews.Author: Ricciolissimo
Reviews.Content: since i booked the room i clearly asked for a room suitable for a WHEELCHAIR ..................... You were so polite and nice that i decided to come to your hotel with my mom, that is on a wheelchair You saw my email with my requests and by mail answered that you would have done the best to reserve the room i was asking for. So to me there was any problem, sure to face the requirements i made by mail, and sure that there was no problems for my mom. i chose your hotel cause you assured me everything was ok..... But the best had yet to come, i mean as i arrived in your hotel on April 5th (thursday), you showed me a very tiny tiny room ( nr 111 ). i started laughting, because it was letteraly impossible to enter with a wheelchair !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Because of it i was forced to chose a suite room ( Sophia nr 603 ) because of the many problems entering in your standard rooms. I am sorry but you werenâ€™t sincere to me. i had to pay 203 euros more to have a suitable room for me and my mom. This money i had to pay as i checked into your hotel Golden Horn. I donâ€™t think this your behaviour is nice, because i was better for you to say by mail that your hotel wasnâ€™t able to take people on wheelchair. so i could chose another hotel without problems.... This is not my fault but YOURS, because you wrote to me you would have done the best for the wheelchair. Our suite even i paied more money wasnâ€™t suitable for a wheelchair especially the bathroom there was no way to get inside!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! And to go upstairs at the 7th floor for the breakfast was diffucult because there was no lift and a lot of steps to climb. But for this you were nice and friendly offering the breakfast in our room. Anyway i decided to walk upstairs every morning to do our breakfast with our friends. Our first suite was horrible, i am talking about sophia suite. Bathroom very very small, not every day the ladies changed the sheets, in the bed, carpet in front of the shower with 3 halls ( no way for a suite, disgusting ), shower broken the water was or too cold or too hot, the the tube of the water inside the shower broken. Do you think this is a good service for the price i have paied ???????????????????? So i decided to call the reception and i was very very very very upset. Immediately three persons of the hotel came up to the room and i was so disgusted of the room believe me. In a very short time they fixed everything while i was yelling with the manager i think. so the next day iâ€™ve been moved into another suite i think the name is mehmen ( room number 607 ) or something similar. The room was ok but still the access to the bathroom was very difficult............... We also talked to the public relation guy met at the breakfast room and explained everything, he said to tell everything to the receptionist. My advise please is So i am wondering how can we solve this very unpleasant lack of understanding. I really think you have to give me back the extra money i paied for the mistake you MADE !!!!

Reviews.Title: “A great week in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: ElonaBajramaj
Reviews.Content: We had a great week in Istanbul; no doubt one of the great cities in the world.. We had the chance to see many things and this thanks to our hotel s location; only 10 minutes by walking to Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace, Basilica Cistern and Sophia Museum. I want to thank Bes and Fuat for being so kind to us. Our room 509 was great; just reneved and converted from a standart room to a Deluxe one.. I was very happy during my stay; Great people, great location and the best choice. Thank you all.

Reviews.Title: “A pleasent stay”
Reviews.Author: Yousef A
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time at The golden horn Sirkeci. Stuff arefreindly. Room was clean and newly decorated. TV was full of channels. Breakfast was nice with a very pleasent view for the golden horn every morning.

Reviews.Title: “Thank you guys”
Reviews.Author: Faruk H
Reviews.Content: It was all great.. My room Golden Horn was just superb. They reneved the hotel and the furnitures were all new. I want to thank Fuat and Bes for their kindness. Also the breakfast was delicious. all was great; only a small thing I had to tell 3 times to the reception for my lamb and my make-up mirror But thats Ok The location just perfect... Also many Thanks to Ufuk

Reviews.Title: “Felt good”
Reviews.Author: bgjolaj
Reviews.Content: All was Ok.. the 5th flor was reneved and as a Deluxe flor just like the 6th flor. The furnitures new and the rooms were all clean. I want to thank Fuat and Bes for being so nice.

Reviews.Title: “Graet Base”
Reviews.Author: Bill C
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 8 nights and although we had to move rooms twice because of the noise the staff were excellent. Our sincere thanks Bes, Kilic, Ufuk (who bore the brunt of my jokes), Aydin, Hash and not forgetting Super Mario for making our stay enjoyable. The location is excellent, rooms although small are clean and have all the amenities you need. Bill & Kaye

Reviews.Title: “Nice location and nice costumer treatment.”
Reviews.Author: fatjon D
Reviews.Content: The Golden Horn Sirkeci is placed only 10 minutes faraway from the Topkapi Palace; Santa Sophia Museum and Blue Mosque. Also we went to Grand Bazaar which is only 3 stations by trum. Satisfied by the cleanliness; thanks to mr.Ajtekin. Also the breakfast delicios thanks to SuperMario Fuat. A special thank to mr.Bes and mr.Aydin

Reviews.Title: “Amazing people”
Reviews.Author: Marjus S
Reviews.Content: I was amazed how they treated me and my friends. Really a great team...We stayed 4 nights and I want to thank Bes, Fuat and especially Aytekin for their kindness.. The location just great, only 10 minutes from Topkapi and Blue Mosque. The breakfast at the top floor; full view of Bosphorous. Marjus ok

Reviews.Title: “Great customer treatment!”
Reviews.Author: Edvir
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel for 6 days. When we arrived it was 7 o'clock early in the morning. Our room was ready even they had many check-outs for that day. After a delicious breakfast in the top floor me and my parents had a rest and after that we had the chance to visit the old city because of the perfect location of the hotel, 10 minutes from Blue Mosque and Topkapi Palace. Also many thanks to Bes and Kilic. Our rooms 304 and 306 were always clean and for this I want to thank Aytekin and his team of housekeeping.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel and Great employees”
Reviews.Author: geb2011
Reviews.Content: We are just back home from our SECOND TIME at the Golden Horn Hotel Sirkeci... As the first time, we really enjoyed our time over there! The location is just perfect, breakfast traditiionnal and various. Employees are all so great. Thanks to Aydin who is a wonderful person, has been always really nice to us and helpful. What a great employee! Also Sabina who is so polite, hospitable and conscientious. Besjin who was very so kind. Without all of them, our trip to Istanbul would have not been so special. For sure, we will come back a THIRD TIME...

Reviews.Title: “Small place with trash bin instead of window”
Reviews.Author: typechecker
Reviews.Content: Good: great location, nice staff, tasty food. Bad: very small room. And my window was literally a trash bin! There was a thick wall right behind the glass with some light coming from a hole above, and some empty beer cans between the glass and the wall.

Reviews.Title: “AVOID!!! unflexible and dishonest management”
Reviews.Author: Paul F
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for 3 nights in March 2012. I reserved the rooms through booking.com for 2 nights and later 1 night and two colleagues did the same. When I made the second booking for myself, due to a computer glitch, I booked two rooms rather than one. I immediately advised both booking.com and the hotel stating that the additional room for the 3rd night was never intended to be booked, but even with 11 days notice, they pointed to the "NO CANCELLATION" policy and HOTEL MANAGEMENT had refused to budge. Booking.com and VISA have been unable to resolve this to my satisfaction. I've stayed at hotels all over the world and I have never experienced such inflexibility. Charging a guest for a hotel room that the manager knows was booked in error, especially where the guest actually stays 3 nights at the hotel, and causes colleagues to book rooms at the same hotel is a a degree of inflexibility that knows few limits. Quite simply any hotel that is this desperate for cash should be avoided at all costs

Reviews.Title: “Thanks to all of you”
Reviews.Author: vjoldan
Reviews.Content: I want to say all the best words for this hotel and the guys working here. Kilic, Bes, Fuat, Aytekin and everybody else. W stayed here in 404 room and all was perfect. The delicious omlete of Fuat especially.. The location just great and the restaurant had a whole view of Bosphorous

Reviews.Title: “This is the best hotel”
Reviews.Author: Alivecanli
Reviews.Content: We are staying 5 nights and everything was good.thank you for all staff.

Reviews.Title: “All was great !!”
Reviews.Author: Safjela B
Reviews.Content: This hotel has a great location; it is placed just 10 mins by walking from Topkapi Palace; Santa Sophia Museum and Blue Mosque in the heart of the old city. I had a nice time. I want to thank general manager Mr.KiliÃ§; mr.Bes and Fuat. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: “All was fantastic here!”
Reviews.Author: Asllan
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 nights and all of my friends found it nice! Cleanliness wad at the peak and the food was delicious! 10 minutes from Blue Mosque and Topkapi Palace near the amazing Gulhane park! I would like to thank Mr. Bes, Mr. Fuat and Mr. Aytekin.

Reviews.Title: “Great service!”
Reviews.Author: Nouraa
Reviews.Content: I went in Turkey for 2 weeks vacation and I had to chance to stay in The Golden Horn Hotel for a week. It was so far the best service and great location. My mother and I felt so comfortable with everything that the hotel had. Open buffet breakfast ( with delicious food ), very clean room, all the employers really helpful and the list can keep going. Try it and you can see big difference between a lot of hotels around the world. PS. I travel 2-3 times per year in different countries and this was the best experience.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel in istanbul”
Reviews.Author: onurboyaci
Reviews.Content: We are staying first of week in feburary . We had a good time in there. The staff is perfect and location is very good. You must try that hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing!”
Reviews.Author: Muazerimez
Reviews.Content: Ä°t is the best hotel i have ever been and i Will never forget that memories.. Thank you for hotel staff and especially ufuk.. See you later again!

Reviews.Title: “The BEST!”
Reviews.Author: SÃ¼meyra A
Reviews.Content: It isnâ€™t possible to say enough great things about this hotel! A very quick and efficient service. Our room was beautiful, very clean and the beds were really comfortable. We always felt safe and enjoyed during our holiday. I would recommend this to everyone! My thanks especially to Selami Yasik for his hospitality. And of course my thanks to Ufuk Karakus and Kilic Yasik for having a unforgettable holiday. I dont think we have ever been feel so welcome and such special guests. Im very surprised about the negative reviews because it is NOT true. Finally, Istanbul is a great and fantastic city to visit and GOLDEN HORN is the place to stay!

Reviews.Title: “Excelent service...”
Reviews.Author: innakbahr
Reviews.Content: We stayed for a week with my parents.Especially I want to say that the services were always good also staffs were cheerful and intimacy to everybody and rooms were too clear and room services were very fast.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing!”
Reviews.Author: Su42
Reviews.Content: Golden Horn is the most beautiful place to stay in Istanbul. It was a wonderful holiday. The staff and service everything was perfect.

Reviews.Title: “everything was excelent”
Reviews.Author: bahar a
Reviews.Content: we are very happy for taht hotel.Staff is wery excelent and they are very atractive.very good location.and very good breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “The greatest hotel”
Reviews.Author: Albina_Muratova
Reviews.Content: I Love You Hasim! It is the Greatest hotel! Very good breakfast, very good staff and very beautiful and clean rooms. Staff in reception very gentlemanly and respectful. Great vew to Hagia Sifia and Bosphorus!

Reviews.Title: “Better than this is a dream!!”
Reviews.Author: MervSum
Reviews.Content: The best location you can stay in Istanbul. The rooms are very comfortable and have a very beautiful view at the bosphorus. The staff and service are very good en professional. They do everything to enjoy your stay. Next time I will stay definitly only in Golden Horn!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: SuMerv
Reviews.Content: Very good and comfortable rooms, excellent staff and a great location! Next time I will go there again.

Reviews.Title: “Extremely Disappoining”
Reviews.Author: niluanu
Reviews.Content: After all the nice reviews we had read, this hotel turned out to be very very disappointing. The rooms were small and not too clean; the bathroom was tiny and not at all comfortable to use.Climbing into the bath tub can be quite challenging for the elderly. There was no way to control the temperature of the room which, in our opinion, was too warm.There is one small lift. The noise from the traffic can be somewhat disturbing.Overall, the hotel seemed to be in a pretty run down condition. It would be unfair on my part to ignore the positive aspects, though - the breakfast was good and the roof top restaurant has great views across the city. The staff were cordial and the Wi Fi worked. The location is also quite convenient for visiting the attractions of the city. I would definitely not stay here again and do not recommend this to anyone

Reviews.Title: “Staff and location are exceptional”
Reviews.Author: GeorgiaCFI
Reviews.Content: This location provides excellent access to Istanbul's top attractions. Walking to Topkapi Palace takes less than ten minutes, Hagia Sophia and The Blue Mosque are a few minutes more, and and the Grand Bazaar is about 15 minutes walk while the Spice Bazaar is about 12 to 15 minutes in the opposite direction. Don't miss the Archaeological Museum adjacent to Topkapi Palace as its collection is very impressive. While the tram stop is only about two minutes from the hotel, it is not needed unless you want to explore more distant sections of Istanbul. There are many nice restaurants around the hotel and walking in this part of the city was delightful and felt very safe. The hotel offers a very nice breakfast buffet. The waiters, especially Bes, are charming and made us feel very welcome. The chef makes regular appearances in the dining room during breakfast and is not averse to special requests. We paid a few dollars extra each morning for a glass of freshly squeezed pomegranate juice; a bracing and healthful starter. We paid to upgrade from the standard room due to the awkward shower arrangement in the bathroom. However, I understand the bathrooms are undergoing renovations that will correct this shortcoming. All in all, a delightful stay in a hotel with considerable old-world charm.

Reviews.Title: “THIS IS NOT 4-STAR HOTEL!”
Reviews.Author: RL95
Reviews.Content: My father and I stayed in the Golden Horn Hotel for 7 nights during December 2011, and we were very disappointed. Our room was right outside the lift, we thought it would be alright but it turned out to be a nightmare. The room was miniature, two single beds and something that resembled a bathroom, no room for more than one suitcase. The other suitcase had to be put on the floor and had to be moved every time we used the wardrobe. At first we were alright thinking that we just needed a place to sleep. However, when we saw the bathroom we were shocked! It was tiny. You have to be an acrobat to get in the shower. It was a sit-in bathtub with shower, where we had to climb onto the toilet seat in order to use the shower. It was horrible! Furthermore, there was no vanity unit, so the only storage place for personal bags was the toilet seat or the floor. When turning the shower on, the showerhead was not fitted properly so it moved and sprayed the whole bathroom with water. On our first night sleeping in the room, we were awaken by a phone call from some random person. We let it pass, thinking it was just the wrong number. The next night, the person next door snored and snored all night long. It felt like the person was in our room. During the nights we could hear our neighbours use their toilet and their shower. The walls are paper-thin. Also, the room was facing the very busy street and was very noisy! Two nights later, we were rudely awaken by some drunk idiots bashing and shouting at our door at 2am in the morning. We went back to sleep and were then rudely awaken again an hour later by the same drunk idiots continuing to bash and shout on our door. Sick of being woken up at such ungodly times, we called reception asking what was going on. The man at reception knew exactly who was calling and said he was very sorry and it was mistake and it would not happen again. We asked that we would like to see the manger the next morning. The next day we went down to reception and asked for the manger who was â€˜not available.â€™ Because we still had one night left in the hotel, we were adamant to talk to this manger, but he never showed, letting his staff take the blame. We were ready to move out and ask for a refund, when we were offered a deluxe room, as it was out last night we accepted it. The new room was nice but very extravagantly decorated, all we wanted was something that resembled a 4 star hotel. The breakfast was terrible. There food options were: bread, shrivelled up sausages that got more shrivelled up the longer we stayed there, boiled eggs and if we were lucky there was scrambled eggs. The coffee was never hot, it was always luke-warm. My so called 4 star breakfast consisted of one boiled egg, a shrivelled sausage and a piece of bread. I usually love the orange juice at hotels but the one they had in this hotel tasted similar to chilled vitamin C drink. There was also cold meats, I warn everyone reading this: do not eat the cold meats! My father got food poisoning from the cold meats, most likely because they are were not refrigerated properly. No care goes into the breakfast! One morning, I was putting sugar from the packet in my coffee and a moth came out! I was revolted! On the last day, we resorted to the McDonalds down the road, a much better choice. Overall, we would never go back to this hotel. It was a waste of money and no way can be rated 4 stars! Some staff members are very unprofessional, the stairs are a quicker way of getting to your room than the lift, breakfast is terrible and the room we had was horrible. A backpackers hotel would have been much better!

Reviews.Title: “CERTAINLY NOT 4 STAR!”
Reviews.Author: hely51
Reviews.Content: The Golden Horn Hotel. In early December 2011, my daughter and I stayed at the Golden Horn hotel, Ebusuud Cad 44,Sirkeci, for 7 nights. The room for this hotel was booked through â€œbookings.comâ€� , several months in advance, so the hotel management was aware of our extended stay. Yet the room we were given was exceptionally small, right outside the lift entrance on the 4th floor. There was no room for a 2nd suitcase, except on the floor and had to be moved every time the wardrobe was accessed. The worst was the bathroom! It only had a sit-in bathtub with shower. To access it, you had to be an acrobat! Getting out of it with wet slippery feet was even worse! The tiles were full of mould. There was no vanity unit or shelf to place items like a personal bag, this had to be placed either on the toilet or on the floor. The water was not drinkable, no alternative was provided to brush teeth. The walls were paper thin! We could hear people snore in the next room. Just about every night there were disturbances by drunks. One night some drunks thought it was funny to knock on the door at 1am and again at 3am. Trying to make a complaint to the â€œManagerâ€� was not possible as he was â€œnot Availableâ€�. We were ready to move out and asked for a refund, when we were offered a deluxe room, as it was out last night we accepted it. This room was ok, decoration a bit over the top. The breakfast was disgusting! The â€œhot foodâ€� was barely warm. Coffee was always only luke warm. The breakfast sausages were warmed up for days on end, at some stage there was only shriveled up sausages available. The meagre selection of cold meat was off and caused me a stomach upset. The standard of this hotel was in my opinion maybe just above Backpacker Accommodation, certainly not 4 Star as claimed by â€œbooking.comâ€�. Booking.com you are losing your credibility!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Happy new year”
Reviews.Author: Braayd
Reviews.Content: Best hotel in istanbul.thank you very much for everyting.good staaf good service.

Reviews.Title: “excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Andrew v
Reviews.Content: The Golden Horn is just a short walk away from the key sights such as the Blue Mosque, and is staffed by helpful and engaging people. We greatly enjoyed our Xmas stay there. Hashim deserves a special mention for his friendly and efficient handling of the breakfast buffet.

Reviews.Title: “had nice time.”
Reviews.Author: ArditBajrami
Reviews.Content: I stayed for four days in this hotel and really I had great time. Firs of all I want to thank mr.Bes for his kindness. It was a pleasant stay. the cleanliness was at its peak thanks to Mr. Aytekin. My room 313 was superb and I was lucky to stay here. The location was perfect just 5 mins by walking to the heart of the old city. Respects.

Reviews.Title: “Does not get any better..”
Reviews.Author: Demokrat_DL
Reviews.Content: First of all it was my third time in Istanbul but this time I came here with my family. We stayed 1 week in this wonderful city. We arrived at 04:00 pm at the Ataturk Airport. A car from the hotel picked us up and we went there. Our deluxe room was superb.(Mehmet Amca) Location is perfect just 5 mis by walk you can be at Sophia museum and Topkapi Palace. The cleanliness of the hotel was great also. I want to thank mr.Bes for being nice and helpful in everything we asked. Also we learned that the nickname of the cooker was Supermario FUAT and we loughed a lot about that >)). Thank you guys also I want to add that we found this hotel while navigating on tripadvisor. We had a great time in Istanbul..

Reviews.Title: “nice...”
Reviews.Author: Eni X
Reviews.Content: First of all I would l'ke to thank the staff because they were really great. MR. Bes a very nice guy and also their cook, Fuat or as many calls him SUPERMARIO. It was a great experience because I think that you need to feel your self like home while staying in a hotel. the cleanliness was at a great level. very pleased and happy to have choosen to stay in this hotel.. Thank you! From Eni.

Reviews.Title: “Thank you guys...”

Reviews.Content: I was here with my family for 5 days. Istanbul is really a great great city. is a city you have to visit once in your life.. Also our stay in The Golden Horn Sirkeci hotel was enjoyable. We had a great time during our rest in loby and our deluxe rooms were very very comfortable. I wan to thank the staff for their kindness to as especially Mr Bes and mr. Aytekin, thank you and we hope to be back again in this marvelous city.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel with value for money”
Reviews.Author: Harunaysal
Reviews.Content: Upon arrival at the hotel we were greeted by a very friendly helpful staff. The rooms were of a good size. The staff have an excelent level of english. The hotel is surrounded by street restaurants.ewerywhere walking distance.thanx for everything.

Reviews.Title: “Best Bussines hotel in turkey.”

Reviews.Content: In think that the golden horn hotel has the most beautiful designed rooms in istanbul. They are ottoman style. They are very attractive. The hotel is very close to all historical places in sultanahmet. You can walk everywhere easily. In this hotel you can do breakfast or have dinner in its terrace with a exellent view. You can see whole bosphouros in the terrace. Foods are very deliCious you should taste.We had a seminer in the hotel's meeting room. they offered coffe break with turkish coffe. In addition, the general manager Mr. Kilic supported our transportation with hotels' vip car to the airport. Thank Mr. Kilic for his interest. I absolutely advise this hotel. You should stay there. You are gonna be satisfied.

Reviews.Title: “Unforgetable holiday”

Reviews.Content: The best choice near the bluemosque. There are many pub, clup and night life place close the hotel .if your age young person , you can must choose that hotel.staff perfect and romms are clean and big.

Reviews.Author: maria p
Reviews.Content: I stayed with my family in The Golden Horn Hotel. It was fantastic and wonderfull location. You donâ€™t need to taxi becouse everwhere are close to hotel. Topkapi Place, St. Sophia and Blue Mosque.. Our stay was very comfortable, we were given a very warm welcome by the receptionists who were extremely helpful in advising us on getting around Istanbul and sightseeing and most importantly spoke, fluent English Especially thank you to mr. Reviews.Title: “great location&great view”

Reviews.Title: “we made a great choice”

Reviews.Content: "We searched before going to Istanbul for hotels in the area of "old city" The Golden Horn was a great choice and also this thanks to tripadvisor who brought all the hotels in our home :). We met Mr. Bes, Mr. Aytekin the housekeeping manager and the great Supermario Fuat ; the best cook :))) Thank you for everything we apreciate that. every think was perfect.. Reviews.Title: “Not the Deluxe version”
Reviews.Author: Saydelah
Reviews.Content: FIrstly - be aware that there are at least 2 Golden Horn hotels; one called the Deluxe Golden Horn Hotel and the other the Hotel Golden Horn (which I review here). The staff were pleasant and helpful. Rooms small (to be expected in the old city) and not somewhere you want to spend your days. But the hotel is right in the old city and within walking distance of most/all of the major tourist attractions. Bathroom tiny and a bit smelly. Bed hard - typical for Turkey I think. Our room faced the road which though small could noisy at times and so ear-plugs were useful to have an undisturbed sleep. The breakfast was OK with enough choice but not outstanding. Beware - the fresh fruit juice is extra and pricey and you won't be told this until checking out and paying the bill. In summary, great location, acceptable to good hotel for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Finest Turkish hospitality”
Reviews.Author: felix72
Reviews.Content: A wonderfull Hotel with a fantastic view on the Golden Horn. Allways worth a visit! Very clean rooms, fantastic breakfast and so friendly staff!!! :-) Especially the waiters Hasim and Isa did a great job. Chef Fuat's fish dishes are supreme! I am looking forward to visit this friendly hotel again. I DO recommend the GOLDEN HORN in Ebussuut Cadessi very much! your's sincearly Mr. Axel Fastner from Germany

Reviews.Title: “"Thank you"”

Reviews.Content: It was all great especially the breakfast with Mr. Fuat's pie and omlet :)) I want to thank Mr. Bes and Mr. HaÅŸim for everything. It was all superb especially cleanless. Thanks Mr. Ajtekin and housekeeping staff. I highly recommend this hotel Great costumer care."

Reviews.Title: “A very good experience”

Reviews.Content: Istanbul is a great city and I am happy I had the possibility to visit it. Also the stay at The Golden Horn Sirkeci was pleasant and the best choice we made. I want to thank evrybody in the hotel especially Mr. Bes and Mr. KÄ±lÄ±c, general manager. My dear chef Fuat for the wonderfull pie and omlet :) . A special thank to Mr.Ajtekin the housekeeping manager for the cleanless of our romm Blue Mosque.

Reviews.Title: “Marvellous”
Reviews.Author: fatjongjonaj
Reviews.Content: I stayed here with my friends 4 days and it was great. My friend was here 3 months before and also It was great too. The staff was young and the cleanless was in its high point because of the very gentleman Housekeeping manager; Ajtekin. Also Chief Fuat's Omlet and pie was superb. Many thanks to General manager Mr.Kilic and to Mr.Bes.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it..”

Reviews.Content: It was a very nice and comfortable stay in The Golden Horn Sirkeci. I was here for 4 days with my family and everything was great. I want to thank the staff, Mr.Ajtekin, housekeeping manager, Mr. Bes, Mr. Bes and my dear Chief Fuat for the wonderful pie and OMLET :)))" tHANK yOU ALL

Reviews.Title: “"Vey nice stay"”
Reviews.Author: leonard f
Reviews.Content: "Great breakfast, especially Fuat Usta' pie :)), The rooms very clean (my room 313. I want to thank Bes, Ufuk and Fuat for making our stay great. The nargile in front of Bosphorous superb The location is great."

Reviews.Title: “Unbeleavable experience!”
Reviews.Author: Jan C
Reviews.Content: We were treated like royalty. Our original room had one lightbulb that did not work and we were immediately given another room. Tina and Menduh was especially helpful. After staying there for 2 nights we went on a two week cruise and was very surpised when we where told that we can come and leave our baggage at the hotel after our cruise ended. That evening they organised a shuttlebus to the airport. AMAZING SERVICE. Thank you TINA, MENDUH AND FATMA for walking that extra mile and for many a cup of Turkish tea.

Reviews.Title: “What a excellent holiday”
Reviews.Author: Ozlmygr
Reviews.Content: I stayed for 3 days in this hotel. Everything was perfect. Good service, delicious food, excellent view and polite customers etc.. In addition, the rooms are very comfortable. The hotel is very close whole historical places in sultanahmet. If you want doing holiday without any problem, absolutely you should stay The Golden Horn Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “FAMÄ°LY HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: natalia v
Reviews.Content: We are 6 person with my mother father 2 sister and one brother.We rezerve family room .First we thin one room is not enough us but they give us big family suite room same price.The staff was perfect.We are stay 5 nights and they make a plan for our visit we saw everywhere and we now everything for istanbul.the location is near the gulhane tram .3 minutes hagia sophia and very close blue mosque topkapi palace and big shopping mall.Breakfast is very deligt and fresh.The receptionist ufuk is very good person and you curttenly met him .klc.

Reviews.Title: “second home”
Reviews.Author: Brkszgn
Reviews.Content: My friends advice the golden horn sirkeci hotel.Perfect breakfast wonderful staff and excelent room.you must try.thanx a lot for everyting.kutahya brk sezgin.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel is great, excellent service and location.Very friendly staff and professional staff makes anyone feel like home.”
Reviews.Author: MMMina
Reviews.Content: We had a 7 days trip to Istanbul,we had a great time and enjoyed every minute of it. The hotel was very clean and standard was very good. Our room (dulex room) was great and the view was amayzing. Room service was excellent, our room was always done and cleaned properly. I believe the location was GREAT, 5 min walk from the Topkapi Palace ( we could see the place clearly from our room), Gulhan Park, and the harbor. Tram was around 3-5 min walk as well. Grand Bazar from the other root is also walking distance, i just loved the location. Cafes and resturants every where around the hotel, The Staff were very friendly, polite and helpful (specially Ali, Hashim, Essa, Ayden etc) they truelly made us feel like home. Very warm and welcoming enviroment.

Reviews.Title: “it's OK”
Reviews.Author: brandusa v
Reviews.Content: Me&my freind had a 3 day vacation in Istanbul - a grate&fantastic city. Our accomodation was at "the Golden Horn Hotel" Sirkegi The Hotel was OK, very good location . Our room was a little bit "oldy" but clean ,the breakfast perfect in a turkish stile. The best of the best are the people from the reception&restaurant.Iven they are young, they do a grate job, always very funy, polite and profesional. We would like to come again here. brandusa&monica

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Staff & Location Excellent”
Reviews.Author: triphungry_8
Reviews.Content: Excellent value. Couldn't have a better location, 5 minute walk to harbor and Topkapi Palace. Tram stop is very close, but not needed. Excellent selection of restaurants (and less expensive than in Sultanahmet) within 100 meters; even a Pub on the corner near the Tram stop, to watch the Patriots beat the Jets. The staff couldn't have been nicer or more helpful. Rooms were on the small size but clean with modern bathrooms. Breakfast room is on the top floor with an excellent view of the harbor, and an outside terrace/lounge with non-alcoholic beverages and hookah pipes available. Cold breakfast buffet was good, unfortunately the hot buffet was also cold.

Reviews.Title: “Don't believe their website”
Reviews.Author: powen
Reviews.Content: I've just returned from a company trip to Istanbul. While the city was absolutely fascinating, the Golden Horn Sirkeci was a complete let-down. It touts itself as a 4-star hotel. Let me correct that to 1.5 - 2 stars. I was given a single room. Not only was it tiny, it was dingy. Here's a laundry list of its faults: 1, It had a double bed (which was firm and comfy) and a single utilitarian brown desk as a dressing table. The corner of one side of the bed was so near one of the jutting corners of the room that one has to be very careful if one needs to visit the loo in the middle of the night! 2. No coffee/tea making facilities, no kettle to boil any water, no complimentary water in the fridge. Gasping for a drink, I had to run downstairs (as opposed to taking the tiny lift which fits 3 - people - without luggage - at most) and across the road to buy myself a few bottles of water. 3. The mini bar is stocked with a few cans of heavily priced soft drinks. Oh, you'll also find ONE empty glass within. If you need more, you'll have to call room service and pay for the extra glass/glasses. 4, Was told they do serve hot drinking water if you call room service. It's free and comes in a cup, not a pot! 5. The air-con can't be controlled. It begins at 27C and if you stay long enough in the room - like overnight, it'll drop to around 24C. 5. The bathroom is a joke. A tiny cubicle serves as a shower stall - it's this triangular space that measures around 3ft across and 2ft at the sides. Don't know how my bigger colleagues managed to shower. The shower is a handheld one which wouldn't stay up on the holder. Upon complaining, a staff came to my room to ram the shower into the holder so that it couldn't ever come out again even if I wanted it to! This being the case, it was then subject to water pressure. If the room next door is having a shower at the same time and stops before you do, the showerhead rears all the way up and sprays OVER the shower screen, thereby wetting the entire sink and shelf area...and your toiletries! 6. Toilet seat - heck, I felt I was a kid again. It was so high that my legs were dangling!!! 7. Oh, by the way, I asked for a non-smoking room but was given a smoking room which, of course, smelled dank. Can't change cos all rooms are smoking ones! Now, if you're thinking I've just been unlucky, you're wrong. Out of the 15 rooms our company booked - 4 singles, 8 doubles and 3 triples - 90% of them are just as bad. Only 1 or 2 rooms were decent, regular rooms, worth of perhaps a 3-star claim. I would say that my room is comparable to one of those cheap, old b&bs in london. Yes, it's that run-down. On the plus side - the buffet breakfast, which was the same everyday (we were there for 5 days), was pretty decent. The yoghurt was delicious as were the many varieties of cheese. The location is the BEST thing about the hotel. Right in the middle of the historical area and within walking distance to all the historical attractions - Blue mosque, Ayasofya, grand bazaar, Egyptian spice bazaar, etc. The roads are cobbled streets and there's a host of cosy restaurants in the nearby surrounds. The tram stop is also just down the road, which makes it easy to access other parts of Istanbul, like the swanky, new, modern shopping centres for a taste of modern-day Istanbul. There are several other hotels along that road - I would recommend that you check those out and not this one. For the price it commands, it's definitely poor value.

Reviews.Title: “THE GOLDEN HORN HOTEL SIRKECI”
Reviews.Author: tkirazli
Reviews.Content: I visit istanbul this summer with my family and stayed in golden horn at sirkeci. excellent service and location. walking distance to most important historical places in istanbul. so, you don't have to worry about transportation. besides, the view of the room are great, and people who are working there are kind, genial, and so helpful. overall, I strongly recommend this hotel for everyone if anyone wants to travel to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Not even 2 star”
Reviews.Author: TessaSydney
Reviews.Content: Listed as 4**** boutique hotel by my tour company. First night we were put in a romm virtually windowless in the basement. Although clean it had an unpleasant smell and was like being in a dungeon. second night we were upgraded to a deluxe room which was spacious, hada nice bathroom and very satisfactory. On our return to Istanbul after a night away we went back to a standard room which is very tired and depressing. The carpet in the room and common areas was badly stained and in urgent need of replacement. We only had one breakfast there and although the top floor restaurant had a nice view it too was very shabby. The Europeans were well catered for with a lot of salads,meats,cheese etc but for others like Australians the selection was very poor. The staff seemed friendly and the overnight receptionist on our last night was very helpful in trying to locate some laundry for us. However I would not recommend this hotel due to it's poor condition and there are many others in handy location to the sites.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: BaharKaraboga
Reviews.Content: The staff and the hotel itself were just great. The rooms were clean and the location is just perfect. I would recommend to all people who are planning a trip in Istanbul, Turkey. - Bahar Karaboga

Reviews.Title: “inspiring indeed!”
Reviews.Author: mia189415
Reviews.Content: i must say the hotel was exceptional ad this was mostly due to the staff who were friendly,and welcoming.which made our stay pleasant.by all means.! Isa was indeed very helpful and many thanks to him for making our stay unforgettable.the breakfast was superb,and the view from there was enchanting!

Reviews.Title: “enjoyable”
Reviews.Author: mjb41
Reviews.Content: The hotel was comfortable and clean. The staff were vey friendly and helpful, The restaurant on the roof had marvellous views and the waiters were very good at including my 12 year old grandson in the conversation (most waiters elsewhere ignore children!) The breakfast was plentiful, The location is very convenient for most tourist attractions,

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel”

Reviews.Content: it was a good choice to choose this hotel. nice hotel room and good food :) need to thank Hazal my friend in Istanbul who recommend this.

Reviews.Title: “Shiny happy people”

Minuses are very noisy street (have had hard times sleeping with opened windows) and rooms are damn small. But above all the service was excellent. Great thanks to all hotel stuff especially to Isa (very nice young fellow, always ready to assist). If you gonna choose this hotel you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Accidentally in love”
Reviews.Author: mia1444
Reviews.Content: I spent there with friends only a few days, but I was suprised by the quality of the Hotel and I'm sure to be back again as soon as possible :)

Reviews.Title: “Incredible and fantastic with a touch of passion!”
Reviews.Author: Felosh K
Reviews.Content: I can't discribe in words how good this hotel was in my stay! I got a service from the personel that was fantastic and incredible! I had this feeling that it was like my other home. The food and the breakfast was amazing. The room i got was so nice and very clean and good. I loved there patio/terrace, smoked my waterpipe and drunk my tea! I wanna thank Ramazan who helped me with all my questions i had.. he also gaved me advices/tips what i should visit during my trip to Istanbul! Thank you my friend Ramazan.. I will definitely visit Golden horn hotel again (sirkeci, where it is)

Reviews.Title: “Superb staff & truely Excellent location.”
Reviews.Author: MissDMW
Reviews.Content: I spent 2 nights in the Golden Horn Hotel Istanbul at the beginning of August this year. The lobby of the hotel is bright, modern & welcoming but when I saw my room I was somewhat disappointed given how small and basic it was. It was however surprisingly comfortable...and I slept incredibly peacfully there. The breakfast in the morning was superb and served in a beautiful setting on the top floor of the hotel. The views of the city from the dining area are wonderful. It's the staff & location that make this hotel outstanding. I travel a lot and I don't think I have ever felt so welcomed before. Every single member of staff went out of their way to ensure I had a wonderful stay. I felt safe, welcomed and protected. The hotel is located in the heart of the cities main tourist attractions. You couldnt get a better location. If I return to Istanbul I would definately stay here again & will be rcommending it to my friends. Excellent for the price, location & standard. Thank you so much to all the staff & management there...I'll be back! Donna...Ireland.

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME !!!”
Reviews.Author: erdit
Reviews.Content: The hotel had a great strategic location, just 5 min from the Topkapi Palace, AyaSofia, and the blue mosque,it was in the heart of "the old city"... I also want to add that me and my family were very pleased with everything. The breakfast was traditional, and tasty...I can't forget, and I loved the pipe in front of Bosphorous. Absolutely fantastic experience, and I definitely am looking forward to coming back here.

Reviews.Title: “all was nice and meaningful”
Reviews.Author: jesminaaa
Reviews.Content: Istanbul is one of the greatst cities i the world and going on vaccations there was like a dream.we had a great time in there and my family was so pleasedalso tHE GOLDEN hORN WAS A PART OF THÄ°S MÄ°RACLE AND Ä± EANT TO THANK EVERYBODY.The breakfast also was great. Thank you very much"

Reviews.Title: “Very niceee....”

Reviews.Content: During the time we were in Istanbul we really enjoed the staying at Golden Horn. It was a great view and during the evenings we had great time. We smoked pipe in front of Bosphorous and we slept outside as we stayed at the cafee untill 04:00 :)). Thank you very much guys for your hospitality.

Reviews.Title: “the best quality coming with excellent hospitality”

Believe me Golden Horn can do it with a huge experince. My recommendation is go and try. You will do not regret. Have fun in Istanbul:)

Reviews.Title: “MUKEMMEL”

Reviews.Content: If i summary this hotel with words as below message excellent,perfect service, polite and friendly boss Mr.kilic :) thank you very much..

The breakfast was very delicious; everywhere around the hotel the order and hygiene were at highest standards. Thank you all for the relax moments in the wonderful Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “it is the best”

Reviews.Title: “superb”

Reviews.Content: This is a superb hotel with a very courteous personnel. I would like to thank everyone for the hospitality and the excellence services provided. I have always had a deep appreciation for Turkish cuisine and chef Fuatâ€™s omelets truly met my expectations. They were delicious. I hope that one day I will revisit the Golden Horn room and cherish the wonderful memories that I made there. I highly recommend this place.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stuff, Wonderful Location!”

We would defenetily come back for next time for sure! Thank you again to all the stuff!

There is a panoramic view from the restaurant, where the included breakfast is served. The staff is great. We arranged for a pick-up from the airport (and a drop-off to), which was much appreciated. We would (as the title says) definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “greaaaat, of course we will be back.”

Reviews.Content: Everything was very good, specially the Team at the Restaurant: Isa-fuat, Besjon, Inan, Murat and Hasim. Always helping with where to go and how to get the places easier! Food was the best from the hotel. The breadfast was gorgeous! Better than many places on the city Regards from Luis&Fede.

Reviews.Title: “ecellent”
Reviews.Author: jeart
Reviews.Content: The time I stayed here was really great. My room the suit Mehmet Amca was amazing. The breakfast and the view of the hotel were great. I want to thank everybody, Fuat, who made a fantastik breakfast, HaÅŸim, Murat, and also the Mr. KÄ±lÄ±Ã§, the menagger.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience”
Reviews.Author: sadlika
Reviews.Content: It was a pleasent stay in Golden Horn. I want to thank everybody there, Mr. Besjon; Mr. KÄ±lÄ±Ã§ and the great Mr. Fuat who prepared a fantastic breakfast. Thank you Golden Horn Staff.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: JJ607
Reviews.Content: The best thing about this hotel is the location. Many of the major sites are within walking distance and there is a tram stop right at the end of the street. We went running in Gulhane Park some mornings, which was very convenient- only 2 minutes away. We found all staff members to be friendly and helpful- especially the restaurant staff. The restaurant is on the top floor and has great views of the city. The food quality and variety was good. The room was definitely tiny, but fairly clean and basically comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “WE HAD A GREAT TIME AT THE GOLDEN HORN HOTEL”

Reviews.Content: THE STUFF AT THE GOLDEN HORN HOTEL IS WONDERFUL (Mr Besjon Zenelaj, people at the recpetion and all the team was so friendly with us). We definitely want to come back as soon as we can... Maybe in december 2011 at Xmas time. Thanks Golden Horn for everything!

Reviews.Title: “It was pleasure to stay in the hotel Golden Horn and Mr. Kilic Yasik was very cooperative very good service by him.”

Reviews.Content: Best man on earth Mr. Kilic Yasik. I think you people should be proud to keep him on job.......he helped me a lot in istanbul to get things sorted very genuine man......

Reviews.Title: “Lovely & enjoyable”

The food was delicious and the views of the city and the Bosporus bridge from the hotel's terrace were wonderful. This was all enjoyable thanks to the nice personnel, especially the manager, Mr.KÄ±lÄ±Ã§.

Reviews.Title: “We loved Istanbul and the location of the hotel”
Reviews.Author: LPHDK
Reviews.Content: The location could not be better. We walked everywhere - within 15 minutes top you can see all the big sights. Also you can walk within 2 minutes to the tram and 10 minutes to the ferries.There are plenty of good cheap (for european standards) restaurants in the area and people are really nice and helpful. The breakfast at the hotel is ok, I just had the yoghurt, but they charge 7 EUR (you can buy fresh for 1 Lire on every corner) for a glass of orange juice!!! They are helpful at the reception, if you ask for directions and help like this, but if you ask for e.g. the free meal we had for booking 7 nights they can't just answer and you have to book a day ahead, which seems ridicoluos. There are some noise from the streets, but with earplugs in, we slept like babies :-) I would stay there again in a heartbeat!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome location with friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: Emad_Shash
Reviews.Content: It was an unforgettable vacation; an excellent location with friendly staff. Everyone was so friendly from the time we had stepped in until we left!!!

Reviews.Title: “It is a nice hotel with very important location”

Reviews.Title: “ok!!!”

Reviews.Content: 4 star according to istanbul standards. small roomsthough. i could hear other people in nearby rooms. but easy to get to metro and in the center of sultanamet and other tourist places. i took the metro from airport. airport to zeytinburu and then change to another line. get out at Gulhane and just walk across the first street opposite the station to reach the hotel. cost me 3.50TL in total !!!!!! friendly staff for sure. overall if on my own I will stay there again.

Reviews.Author: gwpyvr1
Reviews.Content: Not quite as advertised. Thankfully had a room on the front. Room was adequate but carpeted floors were not clean. Front desk staff were not at all helpful. Breakfast was alright with friendly staff. Good location. Don't confuse with the "Deluxe Golden Horn".

Reviews.Title: “Not as their website sells it”
Reviews.Author: Aussierosie21
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed with this hotel. Our room was dark and so small we couldn't have our suitcases open and move around the room at the same time. We were at the back of the hotel with a tiny window that overlooked a fire escape and the diesel generator that kicked in during the frequent Istanbul power outages. The staff seemed to be unable to find us another room. Our double standard room looked nothing like the website featured photo. The hotel has a bar with no alcohol and you are not allowed any alcohol in any of the lounge areas.

Reviews.Title: “"Love to Come Back!!"”
Reviews.Author: Rashid2000
Reviews.Content: My wife (Iffat) and myself stayed in Golden Horn Hotel (Sirkeci) for about a week. With the help of the hotel manager, Mr. Malik, we had a great time in Istanbul visiting historical places, eating at restaurants and traveling in trams and trains. The staff at the hotel was excellent. Very friendly and cheerful, specially Mr. Malik. He was extremely helpful in charting out our plans for visiting Istanbul. The Bosphorus cruise he recommended was very good and enjoyable. In addition to Malik I want to specially mentioned Mr. Salahdin, the van driver who dropped my wife to the airport. He was helpful in providing assistance in handling the luggage as well as taking her to the airline office to sort out some ticketing problems. We will never forget his customer services. Finally our thanks to Malik, Salahdin, Zafer, Isa and everyone in the hotel staff. Hope to see you soon some day. Rashid Siraj

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel in Istanbul Ever!”
Reviews.Author: Neslyt
Reviews.Content: Everything was excellent. It was really close to the historical places. It takes just 5 mins by walking, no traffic, no stress. If i have a chance to visit Istanbul by near future, i will definetely stay in that hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely.... want to come back”
Reviews.Author: OSotskova
Reviews.Content: clean and cosy rooms, nice location and price range for those how value comfort and quality

Reviews.Title: “Very good Hotel & service!!!”

If you go to Istanbul, go to this Hotel and meet Mr. Kilic He is very kind and make your day good!!!! Mr. Kilic thank you for the good services!! Efendi Kalac Holland Index Insurance

Reviews.Title: “Definitely coming back”

The reception desk was friendly and helpful with directions and questions. the rooms were clean. free wifi at the lobby. Thank you to mesut ,malik dilek and sabine they were very helpfullI, and I would highly recommend this place.

The room was clean, but small and a bit shabby and smelled of cigarette smoke. The reception desk personnel were efficient but not friendly, however, the restaurant wait staff was friendly and helpful. Overall, there are much better places to stay for the price.

Reviews.Title: “I know next time where i gonna stay in again”

The other advantage is being in the centre of city. Im planning to come again and i will book for this hotel witg pleasure...

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service”

I will thank for the fantastic service by Chef Fuat for the excellent breakfast and nice talks. Many thanks to Isa the very nice guy as well as Ramazan, Mesut, and Malik. See you next time. A. YÃ¼ksel

Reviews.Title: “low budget hotel for a lot of money”
Reviews.Author: clapatinul
Reviews.Content: The hotel at the first sight is in a good location in the city but when we get into the rooms we were terrified, the room was so tiny , abou 3x3 and the bathroom the same and also the bathroom has no window, the window was missing and we couldn't take a shower because it was very cold, we had the trip in march and actually it was snowing outside so in the bathroom were about 5 degrees ceslsius.. The room was in a lower floor , i think at the 2nd floor, we asked to change the room because of all of that and the hotel representative extra charged us about 50 euros more/night for a bigger room....i think a human hotel room in this hotel is only at the last floor(5th), the hotel was ranged at 4 stars but i think it deserve only 2 star! I will not recommend this hotel never, if you want to go on low budget it is better to take a guesthouse or a hostel(private room) instead to pay a lot of money for the same services, all the pictures that you find on booking sites are made on the bigger rooms at the last floor ....so don't be fooled. PS : The staff like waiters and valets were very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay!”

Reviews.Content: one of the most beautÄ±ful hotels Ä±n Ä°stabul.Such a great place to stay,close to everwhere you can go everwhere by walkÄ±ng.staffs are so kÄ±nd and frÄ±endly and ready to provÄ±de everythÄ±ng for you.Breakfasts and dÄ±nners are excellent!Rooms are very clean.I strongly recommend everyone to go there and stay at least 1 day!

And thank you Furkan for great service, he deserved all the tips I gave.

Insallah come again very soon, many thanks to Fuat cook the best food he could magic up. Thanks to Isa and Hakan. Emine Erdogan from Denmark
