Reviews.Content: Ä± dont know wat Ä± have to say here , but Ä±t was awesome, To say that Golden horn is "very special", is an understatement. Creating an atmosphere that feels like being at home and on vacation at the same time, is an oustanding achievement at Ä±stanbul. This is because of Golden horn.. We absolutely loved our stay at Golden horn SÄ±rkecÄ±'s. The hospitality from Golden horn & his wonderful staff was impeccable. We spent most of our time at the hotel and enjoying the grounds which were beautifully sÄ±de of Ä±t. We found our unit we stayed in to be very comfortable, clean and the bed was very cozy for a queen size bed.:) you can walk to whatever you might need.I love Istanbul , and Golden Horn SÄ±rkecÄ± Thats All , just try Ä±t :)

Reviews.Title: “excellent”
Reviews.Author: thecoolgirl2410
Reviews.Content: I loved my stay at the Golden Hotel. What made my stay delightfull was the crew on this hotel. Everybody seemed really happy at what their were doing and the workers was always ready to serve and give you the best service possible. Especially the chef cook of the Hotel which made delightfull breakfast every morning was not only a good person but also a helpfull and kind person who loved his job. And furthermore the Hotel is were near centrum and all the turist places. It has a great location. I will recommend this hotel to anybody

Reviews.Title: “Still in my dream:)”
Reviews.Author: Holland31
Reviews.Content: I have visited severals counties till now. Istanbul was absolutely great,thanks to the GOLDEN HORN HOTEL. After we arrived at the hotel,they welcomed us very friendly and got immediatly some drinks(also free:). The location is very nice.It like the centre of the city.You can travel everywhere fast,because of the short walking distance to the bus stop or to the Tram and even to the tour boat. The rooms are very clean. Everything is working percectly. The beds are better than mine bed at home. The breakfast was delicious. I think there were about 50 sorts to eat and I mustnt forget the Turkish tea. And now, the most important is that the service,briefly the people working for the hotel were very kind and respectful. Thanks to Mrs. Dilek , the sales director who helped me to find the right hotel. Ladies and gentlemen,go and stay at that hotel if you want to feel yourself confident and secure. Maybe the hotel could get a computer more so that we dont have to wait longer,

Reviews.Title: “The Best of the City!”
Reviews.Author: duHavre
Reviews.Content: The Golden Horn Sirkeci is marvellous hotel which presents you high standarts to feel like you re the best! Excellent quality, excellent service, excellent location. I recommend this hotel to everyone!

Reviews.Title: “Spectacular Hotel with reasonable prices”
Reviews.Author: CafeBastille
Reviews.Content: I stayed there 2 nights and till I check out, I realized that the Golden Horn Sirkeci is the right choice! You will love the view from the window of your room (it depends on the room that you select. Follow the room names for the view:) the restautant and the service were awesome. Quality, cleanliness, service, rooms everything is great 5/5! you should give it a try!

Reviews.Title: “Seen the best hotel”
Reviews.Author: jxnkouou87
Reviews.Content: Your service is very good, the room clean, comfortable and complete facilities. Next time you come to Turkey have to live in this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “The best of the best!!!”
Reviews.Author: vip23
Reviews.Content: Everything is like starting from the end of the food and service! Hotel cozy nea,have a big room, nice view from window...great service!is the best hotel in istanbul!!!! We would like to really go back there again! He did not describe in words how wonderful! I recommend to everyone! be sure to visit, , not regret!

Reviews.Title: “Very charming stay...”
Reviews.Author: UNSAL
Reviews.Content: The Golden Horn Hotel at Sirkeci Istanbul is a nice and pleasant hotel. I've been there for many times, allways with large groups (students, seniors,...) and all of them have had a great time. Nobody complained about the rooms or the staff. I've nothing to mention about the location, because it's just perfect! The hotel is located in the historical center, near the subway GÃ¼lhane. I would like to thank the staff: Sinan and Bahadir: great directors Tezcan & Dilek: the reservations have allways been arangend very well. Emre: very helpful and he is allways on the right place at the right time. He's capable to give you something extra during your stay Chefcook Mesut: Very delicious breakfast all the time! Thank you all!! Greets and see you soon again Unsal Aytan

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Quality, Excellent Service!”
Reviews.Author: bozalp
Reviews.Content: I stayed there two nights and the quality was awesome. The room was very clean and all the hotel staff were kind and helpful. Location is also very good, you can use public transportation easily with some instructions. All in all, Golden Horn Sirkeci was a really good experience for me and I advice this hotel all of my friends visiting Istanbul, it's number 1! By the way, I would like to thank Hasan for his great concern.

Reviews.Title: “HIGHLY RECOMMENDED STAY”
Reviews.Author: Fatima D
Reviews.Content: The hotel is small, clean and covers your basic needs. Easy walk to sights and tram. Breakfast was the same everyday but still enjoyable. What made it extraordinary was the fantastic and most helpful staff. Malick, Dilek and Mesut were wonderful and most helpful to us and we had a good laugh together daily!! Our Bosphorous tour was also arranged by them....very enjoyable.....

Reviews.Title: “the best hotel in istanbul”
Reviews.Author: chineseadvice
Reviews.Content: GOLDEN HORN HOTEL is in best place of istanbul. it has impressive properties. The staff of GOLDEN HORN HOTEL is so friendship. The rooms of hotel are so clean. The restaurant of this hotel is so nice. We have tasted nice meals with best sightseen of istanbul. The historical place in sultanahmet was seen from GOLDEN HORN HOTEL. GOLDEN HORN HOTEL is the best hotel that we visited.

Reviews.Title: “it has impressive view”
Reviews.Author: CILGINIM
Reviews.Content: GOLDEN HORN HOTEL is the best hotel in istanbul sirkeci. it has beautiful view and best quality. GOLDEN HORN HOTEL is the near of the all famous place in sirkeci. it is in center of sirkce-istanbul. The all famous historical place was seen in this hotel. The meal of GOLDEN HORN HOTEL is so delicious.

Reviews.Title: “Best service ever received in a Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: battalk
Reviews.Content: I go to Istanbul for about 2/3 times a year. The Golden Horn Hotel was my first stay and I really enjoyed it. The train station, the tram, Sultan Ahmet, Eminonu, Topkapi are located (really) near the hotel. Location of the hotel is the best one I had until now. The hotel staff were (really) very friendly and kind people. All of them, the restaurant staff, the cleaning personnel and the staff at the entrance. They made our stay very comfortable. The rooms has everything one needs for a stay.

Reviews.Title: “the golden horn hotel is very excellent for everbody”
Reviews.Author: emre00
Reviews.Content: we stayed golden horn hotel last december . staff was very understanding person. room was very tidy and clean ... everything was very excellent . we like very much . hotel was very comfortable

Reviews.Title: “Golden horn sirkeci”
Reviews.Author: duygum
Reviews.Content: hello everybody, l stayed in The Golden Horn Hotel last week. The Hotel is in a great location in the historical part of Ä°stanbul. The rooms are clean and comfortable, and the breakfast on the terracee has a wonderfull view... l also want to say thank to Ramazan he is so polite to us... and all staff is so helpfull and friendly When we go there again we will definitely stay there... Regards from Holland

Reviews.Title: “The Golden Horn Hotel is the hotel I recommend you without doubts”
Reviews.Author: EvgeniyaSochi
Reviews.Content: It was October this year. My friend and I were looking for a good but not expensive hotel in Istanbul. That process took us about 3 days full of search via the Internet. Finally we stopped at the Golden Horn Hotel. And the hotel with its professional staff justified our hopes. The location is good. Its about one train station to the city centre (Sultanahmet station). As for us, we didnt get any transport and the walking took us no more than 10-15 minutes. The rooms are clean. By the way, there are a conditioner and a fridge. When we arrived, there's only one room of our (standart) category. It was ok, but there's no any view. Thanks to the fronf desk clerk named Mesut we changed the room the next day. Mesut is very polite and attentive person. Moreover the hotel staff is very responsive! Most of all we liked the buffet and an amazing view from the restaurant's terrace.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Eli51
Reviews.Content: *l found this hotel on tripadvisor. i went to this hotel, really the hotel is very nice and very friendly. All the staff in the hotel was very nice and polite to us. When we needed help them, they helped us all time and there is a reception he name's Ramazan so enjoyed and so helpfull... The hotel is very clean and the food is delicious and terrass very nice view Eli

Reviews.Title: “wonderful view,wonderful Istanbul,wonderful staff”
Reviews.Author: GeorgeandWolfgang
Reviews.Content: I stayed in Goldern horn sirkeci with some of my friends from England.we liked walking around istanbul,especially around blue mosque and grand bazaar,we really walked a lot and shopped a lot so we were really tired..when we return back to our hotel staff at the reception welcomed us very friendly and brought something to drink straight away and helped us to carry our bags into our room,they were very kind and friendly..I also want a special thank to MESUT,he was our receptionist as well as our organisor for the night outs in Istanbul,he knows everywhere and which place is the best..breakfast and the view was brilliant..when we go there again we will definitely stay there..

Reviews.Title: “A very friendly hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Liisa189934
Reviews.Content: We were having short holiday with 2 children age under 12. The hotel room was very clean and the breakfast was very good in choices. The staff were very friendly, and our kids loved them. We had a very comfirtable stay in this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “very nice and kind people”
Reviews.Author: taz96
Reviews.Content: very good room service, kind staff,especially this one staff called ramazan

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding service ;)”
Reviews.Author: Tanju2060
Reviews.Content: Service of hotel The Golden Horn was realy good and enough to be pleased. Their rooms,locations and the place of the hotel is very nice, my opinion about this hotel is absolutely perfect. From now on The Golden Horn Hotel is my indispansable place that i can travel and accomodate in Istanbul /TURKEY

Reviews.Title: “my opinion in the hotel”
Reviews.Author: anoosss2007
Reviews.Content: I think he is a good hotel and good service and the personnel involved are good people and I remember someone from the staff emre It was a very nice person and helpful and hard working and gentelman and charismatic.

Reviews.Title: “I highly recommend this hotel to anyone seeking a home away from home.”
Reviews.Author: sagcum207
Reviews.Content: Nothing beats the excellent service meted out by the staff of this hotel. The warm greeting upon arrival from reception made me realise that i had chosen the right place to make my stay a memorable one. The staff at reception was so helpful, courteous and friendly that I wish I had stayed for a longer time. Also, the hotel's location is in the center of all of the main attractions. Restaurants, shopping stores, historical sights, transporation are all within close proximity to the Golden Horn Hotel. On my next trip to Istanbul, Turkey I'll definitely stay here and bring other friends and family along with me. Cheers!

Reviews.Title: “everything is excellent for you”
Reviews.Author: joe00118
Reviews.Content: we went to istanbul from england last summer . l think that this hotel is very nice for everything . stuff is very hard working person for you espacially kilic . the room is very comfortable . it is also cheap

Reviews.Title: “it was so nice hotel.”
Reviews.Author: fhm09
Reviews.Content: i went to istanbul last august with my schoolfriends from finland and we enjoyed very very much in the golden horn. it was excellent and high quality place. i think that going with my girl friends again next summer.

Reviews.Title: “It was a very nice hotel and very friendly.”
Reviews.Author: saif_10
Reviews.Content: I found this hotel very nice and very friendly. All the staff in the hotel was very nice and polite to us. When we needed help they will be at our door in no time. The hotel is very clean and the food is delicious. They have a lounge where you can watch tv but you have a tv in your room which is very nice. They provide everything, e.g soap towels face wash. They have nice food and drinks in the fridge where you can buy and its very cheap. There is a computer to check your e-mails and social network. Overall the hotel was very good to stay in for a week and i didnt get bored at once :)

Reviews.Title: “golden hotel is very wonderful for you”
Reviews.Author: angel0144
Reviews.Content: i went to turkey last september. i found at hotel on the tripadvisor. i found the goldern horn hotel. the room is very clean and tidy . i like it . stuff is very understanding exactly kilic . when i was in turkey . l was very happy because of hotel. hotel is very important for me . because if l hate hotel . my holiday will horrible for me . the golden horn hotel is excellent for you . l think that when you read this letter . you choose this hotel. the hotel locaition is very good. it is near to sultanahmet square and grand bazaar .

Reviews.Title: “Istanbul is an amazing city”
Reviews.Author: User1205
Reviews.Content: I just wanted to say thanks to The Golden Horn Hotel, because that was one of the reasons why I had such a great time and lots of fun in Istanbul. Rooms are very cute, beds are comfortable, breakfast is very nice and hotel staff is great. I spent lots of time in hotel with my friends, and we all enjoyed that time. Special thanks for waiter Ramazan, chef of the kitchen and others who were very friendly, kind and professional. Sincerly, Dusan from Rome

Reviews.Title: “A little jewel amidst Ottoman Splendors”
Reviews.Author: Ithaka_47
Reviews.Content: We recently took 30 international high school students from Rome to Istanbul on a week's study abroad program and we were more than content with The Golden Horn. It is located within 10 walking minutes from all of the major sites which is one of its many appeals. The staff were open and elastic regarding our needs and tried to accomodate our diverse requests. They helped with the survaliance of our students and we were allowed to work closely with the kitchen staff preparing menus for our evening meals which were consumed on the top floor which has a beautiful terrace overlooking all of Istanbul. The hotel and nearby areas are very safe and offer many comodities. The only issue which needs to be addressed are the rooms. They are quite small but the management has assured me that they will be renovating in the Spring to rectify this issue. My recommendation is without reserve.

Reviews.Title: “golden horn Ä±s excellent for you”
Reviews.Author: emrecaliskan01
Reviews.Content: the hotel is excellent for my family . we love Ä±t . Ä±f we come to Ä±stanbul. we will stay the golden horn hotel. the room is very clean . the staff is very understanding person. breakfast is excellent. Ä±t Ä±s also not expensÄ±ve....

Reviews.Title: “The pits!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Awful rooms and filthy. Stale Cigarette smell through everything. The breakfast was diabolical - very poor quality and the kitchen cleanliness - which you can see as you enter the breakfast area was very dirty. Service not great they are very off hand and dismissive of valid comments. Rooms are small with lumpy beds and pillows. Enter and stay at own risk.

Reviews.Title: “Not value for money”
Reviews.Author: travelerson
Reviews.Content: Good stuf, nice roof wiev, no value for money, breakfast may be better

Reviews.Title: “NEVER AGAÄ°N !!! THAT WAS TERRÄ°BLE...”
Reviews.Author: canturk077
Reviews.Content: I stayed there for 5 days and Ä± couldnt enjoy anythng , cos Ä± couldnt sleep cos of the bad voice of the cars passing just in front of the hotel , and the rooms are so close to eachother , thats why Ä± was hearing all the thngs that the other rooms were talking... just the location is good , but the others are terrible. at the first day Ä± was there , before Ä± chech in , the old receptionist was nearly to fight with one of the customer and she was cried so badly , Ä± just asked her to stop srying but she told that the receptionist told her bad words. maybe he was old that was the reason. Ä± asked for to change my towels , but they didnt do that for 2 days , after that Ä± called the reception again and again, the day after tomorrow they did that. Ä±t was like a nightmare holiday to me cos of that hotel , Ä± asked for help but nobody didnt...just without the guy who was waiting for the luggages.he didnt take even money from me cos he also saw what Ä± had there... Ä± tried to have somethng from the restaurant of that place , but Ä±t was the last time that Ä± wÄ±ll thng again , Ä±t was terrible , not fresh food... at the end of the day Ä± asked for help to take a taxi , the old receptionist told me that just open the door and shake your hand , one of them will be stop next to you ... Ä± think this answer is enough as a summary... never again....

Reviews.Title: “Budget hotel with all the benefits”
Reviews.Author: daqster
Reviews.Content: Booked through lastminute.com and was promised a 4 star hotel with all amenities. Not a true representation as it is a great budget hotel but not 4 star. Having said this, the location is fantastic, service was wonderful and hotel is clean with free wi-fi. The rooms are small with limited facilities but if you are staying in Sirkeci, then you shouldn't really be in your room as there is so much to enjoy outside. Breakfast is on the roof terrace and is a great spread to Turkish cuisine and enough to keep you going for most of the day.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: valeanna
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the hotel together with my boyfriend for the long 1st of May weekend. We decided to book the trip at the very last minute, so it was tricky to find the right hotel to stay in. This one seemed to us and turned out really to be a good value for money, perfectly situated in proximity to all main sights. We booked a room without sea view, as we planned to walk around, so didn't care a lot for that. However, if you do find this important this hotel is the right one to offer you great view on Blue Mosque and the sea. If not in the room you can enjoy the view during the breakfast at the terrace on the last floor. The room itself was really tiny but clean and cosy. The breakfast was good and offered good choice, except for its sweet part - mainly the same biscuit but in different shapes!!! And this, given the variety of sweets you can easily find in this city! Fresh juice was available, but for extra money...

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Service & Great Location”
Reviews.Author: GordonLee
Reviews.Content: You may not wanna believe it but the service at Golden Horn is superb - we were even being offered the receptionist's car at 2am in the morning for a cruise, just for the sake ot it! They are kind and knowledgable in every respect! - The location is also very good as it is close to all key destinations such as Blue Mosque & Grand Bazar. Only thing that could/should be improved is the breakfast - yes there is a wide selection but the food aint that great! To sum up: A great hotel - worth trying it!

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, helpful staff, great location”
Reviews.Author: turkeytraveller44
Reviews.Content: Golden Horn Sirkeci is in a great location in the historical part of Istanbul. The staff is very helpful and friendly, especially Mesut at the reception desk. The rooms are nice and comfortable and the breakfast on the terrace has a wondferful view! I've stayed in many hotels in Sultanahmet area and this is one of the best.

Reviews.Title: “thanks for everbuddy.”
Reviews.Author: antari
Reviews.Content: i have been in this hotel for recomandation.and i can recomend to traveler to stay in golden horn has great breakfast with a wonderfull wiev.in the chek in time i never see somewhere else that warm hospitalty welcoming. it is in the center that you can reach ver easy to the museums shopping. Hans van der Bergen .thanks for all stuff especially people are from reception desk was so helpfull

Reviews.Title: “The Staff make this hotel special”
Reviews.Author: Holland-38
Reviews.Content: Excellent staff & service, pick-up service airport (25euro) great place, small room (301) but Clean! Execellent breakfast and just a couple of walk minutes away from Bazaar (10min) Blue Moskee (10min) Bosporus (5 min) Topkapi (5min) But the staff make this hotel special! Special greetings tot Ramazan!

Reviews.Title: “the best hospitality !”
Reviews.Author: disconnectusErectus
Reviews.Content: 5 out of 5 stars. The Golden Horn Hotel offered a clean and safe space at a comparatively reasonable price for my 3 day relocate. Meset Akdeniz (front desk clerk) was consistently polite and helpful; and the hospitality of Turkish !. It made me feel that i am home. I was amazed, the way they talk,serve and look. Transporation is really easy. You can take tramway just across the street. You will watch out and see the blue sea and seagulls.and you can use public transportation unlike any cities in U.S. In a word : Thanks

Reviews.Title: “Don't understand how this hotel gets good reviews”
Reviews.Author: anopenroad
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A TWO STAR HOTEL. I booked this hotel after reading reviews on this site. I've just re-read the reviews and am puzzled by them. I was staying two weeks and paying a good price so expected a good room as my stay was so long. The room was tiny and dark, the carpet threadbare, the TV hardly worked, pigeons were roosting in the tiny bathroom window, and I had no view as my little window was hemmed in by two walls. The air conditioning didn't work well and timed out so you woke up sweating several times a night. There was no bar (apparently the owner disapproves of alcohol - and overnight guests) ther was no restaurant or room service or any other facility you would expect in a four star hotel. I was there four days before I learnt there was a roof terrace where breakfast was served so I think much of what I was saying was misunderstood. I was robbed on my first day in Istanbul by somebody who said they knew engaged me in conversation and sais they receptionist where I stayed. When I returned to the hotel very shaken and reported this to the receptionist he said he did not know the man and gave out to me saying if 'I wanted to buy carpets or some things I should have asked him as he could get good deals' - The theft had nothing to do with carpets - I was mugged going into a Turkish Bathouse which was top of my list going there. Budget and confidence dented I stuck close to the hotel and it was grim. The receptionist once called me a Taxi to Taksim and it turned out I paid about triple what it should have been. Towards the end of my stay I decided the Bathouse experience had to be had so booked through them and was quoted 50 lira including a lift to the bath. On departure I was charged â‚¬50 not lira. Most of the staff are friendly and genuine but there is a distinct sense of hustling going on too. Not for the faint hearted and certainly not at that price.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: flintstone09
Reviews.Content: This hotel was pleasant and in a great location. The rooms were well appointed, and the reception area had a bit of a grand feeling which was nice - like coming back to another world after the day out. For the price we paid I would have expected a slightly better range of food for breakfast. But really this location can't be beaten - just a few minutes walk up the hill to Sultanahmet and a 5 minute walk downhill to get to the ferries. Really it was the perfect spot - it was nice to come back to the hotel and be a bit removed from all of the touts in Sultanahmet - while they are often full of fun, it sometimes got a bit overwhelming for us. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Poor Rooms”
Reviews.Author: kezzyhomeros
Reviews.Content: Service and Staff is alrigh, but Rooms are quite worn and not clean enough.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, nice hotel but....”
Reviews.Author: Tim0807
Reviews.Content: Be aware that when we arrived, the man at the desk asked us if we wanted an upgrade to a superior room for 60 euros (3 nights) we agreed however the room was very standard the promised view was possible if you stand on the very small balcony and twist your head as far to the left as you can reach. We were ripped off! The Gym was basic to say the least with no sauna even though its on its website . Apart from that the hotel is great and the staff friendly in a fantastic position. Tim

Reviews.Title: “Buyer beware!”
Reviews.Author: HutchKS
Reviews.Content: This hotel is centrally located close to a tram stop, the railway station, the Hippodrome, Hagia Sophia, the Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace, the Sultanahmet, and many very nice friendly eating establishments. However, beware of the following: The pictures on the web-site may are not all from the same hotel. There are two Golden Horns, one in Sirkeci and one in the Sultanahmet. When you make your reservation ASK about the rooms. We stayed at the Sirkeci site, and the rooms, toilets and restaurant did not look anything like the photos on the web-site. Unlike the representation on the web-site, the rooms did not have sound-proof windows, bathtubs or a minibars. They were NOWHERE near the size as the photos on the web-site depicted. There was not even room in the room for a chair, and to sit down you must sit on the floor, the bed or the toilet. Although the web-site advertises a bar the Sirkeci bar offers non-alcoholic drinks only. The bar does not offer alcoholic beverages PERIOD! Avoid the fifth floor, as the sixth floor is undergoing heavy re-construction and the noise and dust is pervasive. Ask for a room with a window that opens. The window in our initial room was screwed shut. The air-conditioning was either hot/cold. Management obligingly changed rooms when we requested a room with a window that opened. Contrary to the web-site representation, at Sirkeci the toilets have showers only, and they do not drain as quickly as even the lowest volume of water required to shower, and your feet soon will become immersed in gray water with black specks floating in it. We tried twice to get this corrected but the General Manager and the maintenance person did not view it as a problem and it persisted throughout our stay. The hotel has a strict policy against bringing in outside food and drink, including water. This is a problem, as the hotel water is not potable, the mini-bar has only two 1/2 litre bottles of non-gaseous water in it, and cost 8ytl each. There was no fruit available in the hotel and the only snacks were Cheetos, pistachio nuts (unshelled) and candy. Their restaurant was good and the staff was friendly, but, if it matters to you, they do not serve alcohol, not even beer. They make you pay your entire bill in advance, and refuse to honor their own 48 hour advance notice rule for cancellations. We were notified by Turkish Air of flight problems that required we leave a day early in order to ensure our connecting flight home. Even though we notified the hotel four days (over 96 hours) in advance, we were told that since we had already checked in the hotel would not refund the one-night charge because our notice was not 48 hours in advance of our initial arrival. This was disturbing enough, but the General Manager told us that even if the room was rented to another party, we would not be credited for the night. The internet was frequently unavailable. There were many other hotels in the same block. Check them out before agreeing to stay at the Golden Horn. If you stay here, call and ask about the rooms. The General Manager did not feel the web site was deceptive, even though it advertised rooms and services that were not offered.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, central, with a wonderful view at breakfast time”
Reviews.Author: Magpiesfan
Reviews.Content: Only a few minutes walk to some of the best sites.... Topkapi, Aya Sofia, Sultanahmet, Cisterns, Galata Bridge, Grand Bazaar.... And from the roof terrace (breakfast is served there, but you can go there anytime day or night), you can watch one of the most exciting maritime views in the world. It's a busy waterway, the Golden Horn... Good cafes and restaurants nearby, full of locals. The rooms are a little small, but seeing as Istanbul is so exciting, you will only be in them to sleep.

Reviews.Title: “Location good, Hotel bad”
Reviews.Author: ysadeq
Reviews.Content: They put us on a floor that was between the ground floor and the first floor. You cannot use the main lifts to get there, you have to go round the back to the fire exit stairs, which was not really nice, and use the lifts there. Room 117 was really small and it was not what we expected. The rooms were not ready, room 117 was a mess and I had to ask them to get a cleaner to clean the rooms up. Room 116 had cigarette smoke. We were placed at the back of the hotel, where there was some work being done outside, which was a nuisance at times. As we were on a floor between the ground and the 1st floor, we had to use separate lifts which do not go to the top floor where the breakfast was being served, instead we had to go up to the nearest floor and then walk up several stairs. My mother is elderly and has a disability, she struggled. Health and safety issue with the breakfast room, where people kept on tripping over the border that crosses the room from one end to the other. It is dangerous. Not a friendly hotel to stay in. Management were not very helpful, I did raise this issue with the agent [--].com but they never replied to any of my messages.

Reviews.Title: “Not Good”
Reviews.Author: robyness
Reviews.Content: Was not impressed with this hotel at all. The air conditioning did not work in my room and it was like an oven in there. One wall had heating pipes in it and consequently it was HOT!. The staff tried to fix it...well into the night but seemed to give up. Left all the parts on the floor! I was moved into another room the next night. I compared notes with the person who had my previous room and they had the same experience. Air con had not been fixed and the room was unbearable. The staff, to their credit, were very helpful and polite. Good location though, close to restaurants and the Grand Bazaar.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location but.....”
Reviews.Author: Numbat
Reviews.Content: I arrived early and was grateful to be allowed to check-in at 0900. When I got to my room I was also grateful that I was travelling on a single supplement. I had forgotten how small European hotel rooms can be. There were 2 beds in my room but I would have hated to be sharing it with another. It was clean and comfortable though and the location near the main tourist attractions would be hard to beat. This room was at the back of the hotel and relatively quiet - until the emergency generator kicked in at 0140. At 0440 I found out I was within earshot of 3 mosques. The breakfast room on the 6th floor had great views but the rooftop terrace was closed for reasons unknown. Internet access was provided free of charge in the basement - but the Turkish keyboard took a bit of getting used to! I had little interaction with the staff, but they were friendly and cooperative when approached. Others in my tour group had problems. Some rooms had a heating duct running through them and the air-conditioning could not cope with the heat generated. They were moved out of the room, but the next day new arrivals for the tour were moved into the same room without the defect being rectified - they had to be moved as well. The couples also struggled with the small rooms. We returned to the hotel for the last night of the tour. This time I had a slightly bigger room over the street and the sound-proofing was a long way short of adequate. Ebusuud Cad is a busy street and the traffic noise permeated. You also needed to be a contortionist to get in and out of the shower - not suitable for old or infirm guests.

Reviews.Title: “Definitively a must!”
Reviews.Author: VNeto
Reviews.Content: I have no words to describle the service of the Golden Horn Hotel. The staff is excellent and always ready to help you. I had to deal with some stuff and they helped me a lot! The cleanliness is also great! The maids even organized my messy stuff on a separate part of the room. The hotel is also located nearly to the main hotspots of Istanbul within a walking distance! The international train and tram stations are really close as well, so you can move easily. If you want a good nightlife, The Golden Horn can also provide it - there are several restaurants and bars around it. The best gift shops are located on the paralel street so there you can find the best deals. If you get to go to Istantul I definitively recommend The Golden Horn Hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Management lies”
Reviews.Author: Furball_Mama
Reviews.Content: There are a number of instances where management denies that they made the reservation or asks for a higher rate when you get there. They have a slimy side.

Reviews.Title: “super!!!”
Reviews.Author: Kalemdar
Reviews.Content: Location, service, breakfast, the view... It was super!!!

Reviews.Title: “"heart of old city"”
Reviews.Author: marmaristanbul
Reviews.Content: i found this hotel while i was searching a hotel which is close to everywhere l was stayin in a hotel before golden horn l had to walk 15 munites to take a bus or train.finally i found it and it is in the heart of old city only 1 munite walking distance fom train and tram 4 munites from the bus close to all museums and the places for shopping. the room is clean there all things that you need around rooms have air conditining,minibar,telephone,tv act..personal really so kind and helpful and i think i have to thank to front desk departmant they all helped me during my stay and they also orginised me a nice city tour with boat and buses it was like a drream city and i think that istanbul is a charming city. i want to thank everyone from here to all stuff and departmant.l hopefully see you next time...

Reviews.Title: “Istanbul Dreams”
Reviews.Author: Arshik
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel for 5 days. Initially we thought we will stay here for 2 nights and move on to another location, however we did not as the staff were so friendly that we felt like staying at our relatives. The location was very nice and we were looked after very well. I still remember the staff names and I am in touch with a few of them by email. They offered us an excellent service for the price we paid and every penny spent is worth it. Staff are very fond of small children and my daughters had a very good time with them. I have no doubt that I will recommend this hotel for any one I know traveling to Istanbul. Beside all the things we enjoyed, the hotel services factor was one of the key elements to call this a dream come true vacation in Istanbul for me & my family. 'Te she kurdrum' From Ayra, Bianca, Shira & Arshik (Norway)

Reviews.Title: “One night between Europe and Asia”
Reviews.Author: Shishy-de-Danube
Reviews.Content: Hotel is nice and charming. Location is great. Walking distance to Blue Mosque and Aya Sofia is just what you need once in Istanbul. Restaurant with a view onto joint point of Asia and Europe brings some special feelings by itself. Huge seagulls knocking the window while you are eating are very cute after you get used on them which is happening immediately. Stuff is very professional and you can get all information you need in a second as well as relaxing chat.

Reviews.Title: “The golden horn hotel! Ecellent ...”
Reviews.Author: blomastelpan
Reviews.Content: Hey! I just wanted to say how glad im with this hotel. The location is perfect, the staff is very nice and willing to do anything for you, the rooms are clean, the transportations around Golden Horn is very good! Cant say anything else that im very glad that i stayed there and will recomand others to do the same if the want to enjoy theyr holidays in a really good place. You also can get any information ypu need by the reception desk and they orginized me a great city tour. ThatÂ´s a thing i also recomand you do to make your staying there more plecent. Thanks for everything, best wishes from Iceland ;) A.Ã�.R !

Reviews.Title: “Unforgettable”
Reviews.Author: jubailler
Reviews.Content: Golden horn hotel a popular choice for families, set back from but within easy reach of the Istanbul. Situated against a backdrop of Sultanahmet, the Golden Horn is well designed and modern. There is a cozy and beatiful restaurant in terraceâ€š a soft-drink bar in the lobby - for a relaxing day many people choose to go no further! The hotel is very close to the sea and main places such as bosphorus and Sultanahmet(blue mosque),50 metres to metro which runs through Istanbul's beauftiful towns till 12 at night. Book The Golden Horn Hotel and hopefully get the best of Istanbul,Turkey.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay!”
Reviews.Author: Baileyz
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel last june 2008, during my passage to Istanbul. I found the hotel while touring the area and I think it is the best choice that I ever made. Actually, I was amazed with the service that I got for the price that I paid. It is right in the middle of the center of the city, close by to everything and to all action. The rooms are very nice and clean. All the onsite management and stuff was very respectful and super hospitable. The service is number ONE! Specially Mr. Mesut from the reception was amazingly helpful during all my stay and I can say that he guided me for all the site seeings that I made. Istanbul is a great city and is a must see and the Golden Horn hotel is the best choice that you can ever make. I will definitely recommend it to anybody who visits Istanbul. Do not visit the city without staying at Golden Hotel, you won't regret it. Alynna Banis Montreal, Quebec, Canada

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel & Unforgettable experience”
Reviews.Author: aymology
Reviews.Content: I arrived at the golden horn hotel sirkeci as my first visit to istanbul expecting to find a below average hotel. However, i was glad to see that the hotel is very comfortable, clean, well decorated, the staff were very friendly , I was asked to pay my accomodation during check in but i think that is necessary to avoid any inconvenience, the receptionist welcomed me and brought a map and explained me a brief about istanbul and how to find my way around. I was given the room 207 its a bit small but very convenient to me as a solo traveller, it was very nice, clean, quiet & comfortable with a large french bed, tv, AC it had all what i was looking for. The breakfast in the terrace is excellent having a wide variety with a marvellous view over the bosphorus and very nice music playing. The hotel is very well located, just minutes away by foot to the major important sites like topkapi palace, hagia sophia & blue mosque and just beside the tram station and then anywhere to Istanbul. The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful in answering any question and they can arrange very nice tours also. The hotel provides transfer to and from the airport a little expensive but convenient and the price can be bargained. My overall experience in the Golden Horn Hotel was very satisfactory and will definitely book in it in my next visit to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Golden Horn Hotel Sirkeci - Service”
Reviews.Author: bucrugby
Reviews.Content: We had gone to Istanbul to celebrate our Wedding Anniversary. Stay began with a double bed in a single room. Hardly any space to move about with 2 suitcases. ALL the staff, esp Mr Aydin were very helpful/obliging in changing the room following morning. Unfortunately the room was at front of hotel. We could not sleep due to noise from passing vehicles and people talking on the street. At 130am asked for another room change. As before staff very helpful & obliging and in the morning changed to a bigger and quiet room. Because we were on a day tour that day, the staff moved our luggage to the new room whilst we were out enjoying ourselves. The staff are very friendly and helpful and we will not hesitate in booking the same hotel again! Its in a good location for sightseeing & transport. The breakfast is faultless - amazing views, vast selection of foods, seating & freindly service. We have no hesitation in recommending this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “I Love this Hotel, Excellent, Beautiful & Clean”
Reviews.Author: aymology
Reviews.Content: I made a booking in this Hotel expecting an average Hotel, When I arrived I was surprised to find the Hotel to be very nice & clean, the staff were very friendly the reception guy gave me a brief about the city of istanbul and how to get around, The hotel provides transfer to and from the airport. I was given a room for a single person with a large french bed, the room was very clean, tidey and comfortable, the room service was excellent and they made a good job in preparing and cleaning my room every morning. the Hotel provides excellent breakfast in the terrace restaurent that had a very good view over the city of istanbul with very nice turkish music playing. The hotel is within a walking distance to the major monuments like Topkapi palace, Aya Sophia & sultan Ahmed mosque and its also right next to the tram station that can get you to the Kabatas station and then to Taksim square. my overall experience in this hotel was excellent the staff was very polite & friendly the room was very comfortable and quiet and ill defenitely make a booking in the Golden Horn Hotel in my next visit to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “golden experience”
Reviews.Author: Jeddahvisiter
Reviews.Content: Absolutely fantastic place to stay. The apartments are brilliant. Well cleaned, great staff, couldn't really fault it.Owners are genuine hospitableTurkish people! The setting is marvellous, very lively with the shops in the background, but still only about 5 mins from all the action, if that's what you want. Restaurant food is good.(where it's a lot quieter), about 10mins walk away and you can find so many restaurants. Other Restaurants nearby but never really tried. Town was a bit busier than I thought it would be although I am assured that is classed as quiet! Supermarket about 3 mins from the hotel. Get down to the sea walk along the path where the small shops and street markets are.

Reviews.Title: “What a view!!!!”
Reviews.Author: lorizb
Reviews.Content: Upon entering the hotel you are greeted with warmth by Mesut one of the hotel receptionists. Mesut was very helpful and tried his best to make you feel at home.The rooms are much more spacious when compared to other european hotels and hotels in that same area. (I know because this was the 3rd hotel I went to) The top floor of the hotel is one of the best places to relax, there is a restaurant and very comfortable sitting arrangements out on the amazing terrace overlooking the even more amazing view! I would have never been able to see Istanbul the way I did had I not stayed there. They have awesome breakfast up there every morning that is included with your stay. I must say there was definitely a sufficient variety for breakfast. The location is great, in the heart of the old city...not even 5 min walking to Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia. Very Clean and accomodating. Would definitely stay here again. attached our photos i took from the terrace. I stayed there about a week.

Reviews.Title: “hotel review”
Reviews.Author: darwishbashar
Reviews.Content: i Found this hotel very good in the term of its location, hospitality, good value of money, clean and nice breakfast. In addition I found the staff lovely and friendly especially the receptionist malek who was informative and arrange a good tour for us. I would like to raise an important point about the hotel location which lies in an excellent position, all the tourist attractive sits are around and you can walk to reach without the need for public transport and many resturants around.

Reviews.Title: “Bad customer treatment”
Reviews.Author: acruiz
Reviews.Content: They didn't have the room I booked on time, so they put me on a more expensive one and asked me to change my room. When I asked why they were asking me to change my room, they weren't as worried about explaining me the situation rather than trying to make sure I'll pack everything for them to change my stuff from one place to another. When I tried to explain them that I had to unpack things from the backpack that I needed to carry my laptop to the conference and that I couldn't pack everything on the room for them to move stuff, they didn't pay any attention, and asked me once again to pack everything and they'll change my stuff from one room to another. On one hand I don't think they shouldn't ask customers to change their room once they're in, but that would be okay if they asked that kindly and explaining the whole sutation, and more importantly, saying _sorry_ at least once. I would have change my hotel the second day if I didn't had all my colleagues and other friends from the conference in there. On the other hand, the cards to get into the rooms stopped working quite often.

Reviews.Title: “inconformable stay with Golden Horn”
Reviews.Author: simon_zheng
Reviews.Content: The room is very small. I booked a single room, but hotel arrage me a double room with twin beds, each bed is very small. The quilt looks st dirty that I don't want to use. My room window is pretty small. In additions, sound insulation was really terrible, I heard notice from next room from time to time. Of course, there are some good things, such as free wireless Internet, nice breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Good location but bad experience: THEFT”
Reviews.Author: dppietro
Reviews.Content: We spent three night in the Golden Horn Sirkeci. The hotel location is really good, room small but clean and confortable, polite personnel, rich buffet breakfast. But unfortunately we had a very bad experience when in our last day I found out that somone had stolen a document with some money from my luggage (left all along our stay in the room)! Nobody but the bell boy or the personnel for cleaning ever entered the room. Nice stay but heavily conditioned by the robbery we suffered!

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: sctraveler45
Reviews.Content: The Golden Horn has a great location, within walking distance of most of the sights you will want to see in Istanbul. The Blue Mosque is visible from the hotel balcony (and quite audible at prayer times). On the positive, the hotel has wireless internet throughout the hotel and includes a free breakfast in the hotel restaurant. Speaking of the restaurant, the food is adequate, not great, but the view from the roof is great so you may want to eat here one night just for that reason. My room had been recently renovated (some have not yet been renovated) and was overall in good condition. A small flat-panel television was mounted on the wall. Now for the negatives. The rooms are quite small and the beds are very close to each other. So, if you will be sharing the room with someone keep in mind that even though you are in separate beds you are practically sharing a bed with them. Also, the showers are tiny. While the water pressure and temperature are great, even turning around in the shower can be a challenge especially if you are not a petite person. All in all, I'd say the hotel is quite adequate. The great location makes up a bit for the cramped quarters and if you are okay with that trade-off you will likely be pleased.

HotelInfo.Name: The Golden Horn Hotel
